item.title: ADSAI Open Day
item.description: What ADSAI 2022 PhD program presentation. Where Room Morin, H2bis building and live streamed online on Microsoft Teams. When June 15, 2022 at 14:30 (GMT+1). The ADSAI Open Day is An opportunity to meet, in person or remotely, the ADSAI faculties. At the Open Day we will present the 2022 program, its main tracks and wfscilties will be available to discuss application opportunities and the overall program structure. Below, we provide some videos of ADSAI faculties that advertise research ongoing in their laboratory - watch this space while the videos are added before the Open Day.

item.title: Call for 2022 is out
item.description: 2022 call for application is out The call for application for 2022 is out. There are 14 funded scholarships available and 2 additional non-funded scholarships. Please visit the application page for further details.
